definitions.definition: A ravine or gorge , usually one with water running through.

An open channel or trough used to direct or divert liquids , especially to carry materials (logs, mined material, etc) or people (as a water slide ), especially (but not always) one where the walls are raised above the surrounding terrain rather than recessed like a ditch.

main_definition: A ravine or gorge , usually one with water running through.
secondary_definitions: An open channel or trough used to direct or divert liquids , especially to carry materials (logs, mined material, etc) or people (as a water slide ), especially (but not always) one where the walls are raised above the surrounding terrain rather than recessed like a ditch.
